text: Xi'an Daxing Chongde Football Club () is a professional Chinese football club that currently participates in the China League Two. The team is based in Xi'an, Shaanxi. ==History== Xi'an Daxing Chongde Football Club was established on March 8th, 2018, by the former Xi'an Anxinyuan player and coach Yang Xiaolong. Representing the city of Xi'an in the 2018 Chinese Champions League, the club finished 1st in the group stage after winning its first 3 debut matches, and pulled off the feat of advancing to the final play-off stages after beating Shaanxi Xi'an Huilong by tying 1–1 with them in regular time and winning 3–0 in penalties. Although they lost both rounds to Shanxi Metropolis in the final round of 16 and ranked the last, the team was later admitted into 2019 China League Two in order to fill vacancy created by withdrawn team. ==Name history== * 2018– Xi'an Daxing Chongde F.C. 西安大兴崇德 ==Current squad== As of 12 July 2019 关于公示2018中冠联赛俱乐部及运动员报名名单的通知 at fa.org.cn 2018-07-20 Retrieved 2018-10-05 ===Reserve squad=== ==Coaching staff== ==Managerial history== * Gao Xuehua (2018) * Bojan Pavlović (2019–) ==Results== All-time league rankings As of the end of 2019 season. {|class="wikitable sortable" width=100% style=text-align:Center |- !Year !Div ! ! ! ! ! ! ! !Pts !width=2%|Pos. !width=4%|FA Cup !width=2%|Super Cup !|AFC !Att./G !Stadium |- | 2018 ||bgcolor="#c1ddfd"|4|| || || || || || || || || 16 || DNQ || DNQ || DNQ || || rowspan="2"|Northwestern Polytechnical University (Chang'an Campus) Stadium |- | 2019 || 3 || 30 || 5 || 4 || 21 || 18 || 64 || −46 || 19 || 30 || R1 || DNQ || DNQ || |} * in North Group.
